I Bought The ( USB 2.0 2.5 Hard Drive Sata HDD External Case Enclosure From Amazom.com.The Item Works Great,But I Wish The Plastic Around The Case Enclosure Was Stronger.I Was Real Careful About Connecting The USB Wire To The Case Enclosure.But When I Connected It Very Carefully.It Didn't Make A Difference That I Was Careful.The Plastic Where You Connect The USB Wire In The Connection,It Broke In Half.The Main Part Of The Plastic Around The Case Enclosure Is Still Connected To It.But Where You Connect The USB Wire To,The Plastic Is Broken In Half.And To The People Who Said It Was Hard To Open The Case Enclosure,Was Wrong.It Is Actually Easy.If You Look Where The USB Wire Connects To.Turn It Around The Opposite Side,Where The Word ( USB 2.0 ) Is Upside Down To You.And Look On The White Part Of The Plastic In The Very Middle.You Will See The Word ( OPEN ).You Just Stick Your Finger Nail Or What Ever You Want To Use To Open It Up.Put It Between The Box And The White Plastic Where It Say's ( OPEN ).And Pull The Box Up And It Will Pop Up Real Easily.I Did It With My Thunb Nail And It Popped Up Real Easily.And I Didn't Brake My Thumb Nail.Even Though Some People Are Worried About That.
